enabled.description: Enabled indicates whether this action is enabled.

time.description:
Time specifies the time to perform the action.
For daily, weekly, monthly schedules: HH:MM or HH:MM:SS format (e.g., "09:00").

crontab.description: Crontab is a cron expression for cron-based schedules (e.g., "0 9 * * *" for daily at 9 AM).

day.description:
Day specifies the day of the week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, ..., 6=Saturday) for weekly schedules,
or the day of the month (1-31) for monthly schedules.

ActionConfig.description: ActionConfig defines configuration for a specific action.

start.description: Start defines when to start the resource.

stop.description: Stop defines when to stop the resource.

Actions.description: Actions defines what actions to perform on the resource.

metrics_enabled.description: MetricsEnabled toggles Prometheus metrics HTTP server.

metrics_port.description: MetricsPort defines the port for the metrics HTTP server.

validation_interval.description: ValidationInterval defines how often the state validator runs.

timezone.description:
Timezone specifies the timezone for schedules (IANA timezone name).
If empty, system timezone is used.

max_concurrent_jobs.description: MaxConcurrentJobs limits the number of concurrent job executions.

shutdown_timeout.description: ShutdownTimeout defines the timeout for graceful shutdown.

Config.description: Config represents the main application configuration.

Duration.title: Human readable duration
Duration.description:
Duration string: a positive sequence of <number><unit> tokens. Units:
* `s` — seconds
* `m` — minutes (`60` s)
* `h` — hours (`60` m)
* `d` — days (`24` h)
* `w` — weeks (`7` d)
